title: TCO2: Analyzing the Carbon Footprint of Database Server Replacements
authors: Marc Baeuerle, Thomas Bodner, Martin Boissier, Tilmann Rabl, Ricardo Salazar Diaz, Florian Schmeller, Nils Straßenburg, Ilin Tolovski, Marcel Weisgut, Wang Yue

summary.objective: DB 서버 교체의 탄소 발자국 분석
summary.methodology: 서버 교체 시 환경 영향 총합 분석
